amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to appoint chaplains for the military departments in contravention of the Department of Defense Instruction 1304.28, dated June 11, 2004, incorporating change 3, dated March 20, 2014, regarding the appointment of chaplains for the military departments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
